quote: The only true fear is the fear of the unknown.
Believe in yourself. Not in the you who believes in me. Not the me who believes in you. Believe in the you who believes in yourself.
You should enjoy the little detours. To the fullest. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be!
It's not about whether you can or can't do it. It's about whether you do or don't do it.

A lesson without pain is meaningless. That's because no one can gain without sacrificing something. But by enduring that pain and overcoming it, he shall obtain a powerful, unmatched heart. A fullmetal heart.
The world's not perfect. But it's there for us, trying the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
The only thing we're allowed to do is believe. We can't change anything.
anime: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Diamond is Unbreakable

quote: It's just pathetic to give up on something before you even give it a shot.
The difference between the novice and the master is that the master has failed more times than the novice has tried.
The difference between stupidity and genius, is that genius has its limits.
The only way to truly escape the mundane is for you to constantly be evolving.
Hard work is worthless for those that don't believe in themselves.
When people are protecting something truly special to them, they truly can become as strong as they can be.
Failing doesn’t give you a reason to give up as long as you believe.
I'm telling you this because you don't get it. You think you get it, which is not the same as actually getting it. Get it?
It is not wise to judge others based on your own preconceptions and by their appearances.
People who continue to put their lives on the line to defend their faith become heroes and continue to exist on in legend.
If you don't want to die, think.
I want to keep fighting... and continue to be a part of the Survey Corps.
We don't know what kind of people we truly are until the moment before our deaths.
If you don't have any power, then the world is a truly frightening place.
We must not forget our comrades who died for our future.
People who can't throw something important away can never hope to change anything.
If we don't fight, we can't win.
The only way to change the world is to make a little noise.
Our enemy is the Titans. And we will continue to fight until they're all gone!
I don't want to conquer anything. I just think that the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean... is the Pirate King!
It does not matter how many swords you have. I do not fear death.
I want to be able to look back and say that I did everything I could, and I was honest with myself and with others.
It's not about whether you can or can't do something. It's about what you want to do.
I may be a pirate, but I have a code of honor. And if you don't abide by that code, you're no better than scum.
Inherited will. The destiny of the age, and the dreams of its people. These are things that will not be stopped.
If I can't even protect my captain's dream, then whatever ambition I have is nothing but talk.
People's dreams... Never end!
Power isn't determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams!
We are not alone in the ocean of life. We are all brothers and sisters, swimming together towards a common destiny.
The weak have no rights or choices, so make yourself stronger.
The only thing we can do is fight. Even if it means we'll never return home alive.
The only ones who can truly understand are those who share the same sadness.
You may be able to break a sword, but you cannot break a hope.
Don't ever give up, no matter how hard it gets!
I'm not doing this because I want to or because I like it. I'm doing it because I have to.
If you want to protect others, first you have to be strong enough to protect yourself.
Everyone has weaknesses. There's no need to feel ashamed of them. What's important is that we learn to overcome them.
Never forget that breathing is a difficult and strenuous task. So try to stay alive, even if it's just for one more breath.
I don't care if I die, as long as I protect those who are precious to me.
In this world, wherever there is light – there are also shadows.
The key to success is to keep growing in all areas of life - mental, emotional, spiritual, as well as physical.
The pain of being alone is completely out of this world, isn't it? I don't know why, but I understand your feelings so much, it actually hurts.
If you don't like the hand that fate's dealt you with, fight for a new one.
It's not always possible to do what we want to do, but it's important to believe in something before you actually do it.
Being weak is nothing to be ashamed of... Staying weak is.
Sometimes the things that matter the most are right in front of you.
Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
If you can't do something, then don't. Focus on what you can do.
You cannot change the past, but you can learn from it. You can grow strong, you can prevail, and you'll be a better person for it.
The moment you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on for so long.
It's not always possible to do what we want to do, but it's important to believe in something before you actually do it.
In order to overcome your weakness, you have to acknowledge it and have the courage to ask for help.
We have to live a life of no regrets.
No matter how hard or impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal.
